NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
BELLS: Friends, what incredible devices you have constructed in our separation... To think you have built a device capable of tracking the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon's</color> precise location at all times!
2
1
ANNONA: I am pleased you were able to gleam the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator's</color> purpose so clearly! It is heartwarming to be able to share all the things we have built and done in our time apart after the crash, my friends.
3 2
ANNONA: The artificial gravity technology developed on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> is particularly impressive.. I eagerly await the day Nomai on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> will be able to visit you by a shuttle of our own.
4 3
BELLS: An update: Annona, I only just noticed this locator only tracks five of the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon's</color> orbits around the star system.. Why is that?
5
4
ANNONA: We have theorized the existence of a sixth location, but we have not yet been able to confirm this hypothesis - let alone track this hypothetical orbit. Have the Nomai on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> already found a method to do so?
6
5
BELLS: I am unsure how it functions exactly, but.. I am fairly sure the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator on Brittle Hollow</color> is able to track the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon,</color> even when it visits the sixth location!
7
6
ANNONA: How intriguing.. Bells, would you mind guiding me to this <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> sometime? I would be quite keen to learn more about it.
8
7
ANNONA: Though it would be thrilling to explore <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> on my own, I would prefer not to become lost searching for this <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator!</color>
9
8
BELLS: Of course! It would be my honor, my old friend.
BH_QML R1 4
R_SLR R3 5
BH_QML R3 5
BH_QML R2 8
